property.description: Select whether or not to use the JPEG Codec for hardware acceleration.
Select whether or not to use the DRW Engine for hardware acceleration.
Specifies the maximum number of DRW operations before flushing the display list. Reducing this value may reduce the peak heap used by the application but may reduce performance.

constraint.display: Value must be a positive integer

property.description: GUIX internal thread stack size in bytes. Must be greater than zero.

constraint.display: Value must be greater than zero

property.description: Priority of the GUIX Internal Thread. The value must be between 0 to 31.
Time Slice value of the GUIX Internal Thread. The value must be between 0 (TX_NO_TIME_SLICE) to 0xFFFFFFFF.

constraint.display: Value must be a non-negative integer

property.description: GUIX system timer period (GX_SYSTEM_TIMER_MS). This value will be internally converted to RTOS ticks and will be rounded down to the next smallest multiple of the RTOS tick period (1000 / TX_TIMER_TICKS_PER_SECOND).

constraint.display: Value must be greater than or equal to 10
Value must be less than or equal to 1000

property.description: Must be enabled if GUIX functions are called from multiple threads. Set to Disabled when calling GUIX from only one thread to reduce system overhead.
Select whether to enable or disable support for UTF8 characters.
Maximum number of events in the GUIX event queue.

constraint.display: Value must be greater than zero

property.description: Set to Enabled to to use the gx_widget_user_data member in the GX_WIDGET structure.

#ifdef __cplusplus extern "C" { #endif
#define GX_USE_RENESAS_JPEG ${config.azure.gx.use_jpeg} #define GX_RENESAS_DAVE2D_DRAW ${config.azure.gx.use_drw}
#define GX_RENESAS_DAVE2D_COMMAND_COUNT_TO_REFRESH ${config.azure.gx.dave2d_max_ops} #define GX_RENESAS_DAVE2D_FONT_SUPPORT
#define GX_THREAD_STACK_SIZE (${config.azure.gx.stack_size}) #define GX_SYSTEM_THREAD_PRIORITY (${config.azure.gx.thread_priority}) #define GX_SYSTEM_THREAD_TIMESLICE (${config.azure.gx.thread_time_slice})
#define GX_SYSTEM_TIMER_MS (${config.azure.gx.system_timer_ms}) #define GX_TICKS_SECOND (1000 / GX_SYSTEM_TIMER_MS)
#if (${config.azure.gx.multithread_support}) #define GUIX_DISABLE_MULTITHREAD_SUPPORT #endif #if (${config.azure.gx.utf8_support}) #define GX_DISABLE_UTF8_SUPPORT #endif
#define GX_MAX_QUEUE_EVENTS (${config.azure.gx.max_queue_events})
#if (${config.azure.gx.widget_user_data}) #define GX_WIDGET_USER_DATA #endif
#ifdef __cplusplus } #endif
